vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.26.6;
daughter of: Jesse (H3448) and Nahash (H5176I);
sister of: David (H1732), Eliab (H0446I), Abinadab (H0041I), Nethanel (H5417H), Raddai (H7288), Ozem (H0684), Abigail (H0026H)(?) and Elihu (H0453J), Shimeah (H8093)
§ Zeruiah = "balsam"
sister of David and mother of the 3 leading heroes of David's army-Abishai, Joab, and Asahel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hija de Nahas; hermana de David
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
洗魯雅 这个陰性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "香膏"
大衛王的姐姐, 其三個兒子--亞比篩, 約押, 和亞撒黑--都是大衛
手下屬一屬二的英勇戰士
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
洗鲁雅 这个阴性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "香膏"
大卫王的姐姐, 其三个儿子--亚比筛, 约押, 和亚撒黑--都是大卫
手下属一属二的英勇战士
